strings.s: Let's take a look...
Nah... Nothing interesting here...
I already searched this spot... I won't find nothing interesting here...
Hey... This one looks promising...
What's this?
Jackpot!! will flip out if I show her this...
Damn... I'm barely holding myself to not bury my face on it and give it a good sniff... This smell amazing...
Should I take these for This will be my only chance to do it...
TAKE IT
LEAVE IT
This door is inviting... But I should make sure I'm done searching everything in this place before checking it... I won't have another opportunity... Should I try this door now?
DO IT
NOT NOW
Looks like the water heater is really working now...
I wonder why she didn't hear me calling until now... She must be really craving the shower...
A quick peek won't hurt, right? I'm still supposed to tell her I fixed the thing...
Whoah...
Oh man... Look a that... She's really enjoying the shower...
I should have bring my camera...
The bath salts will kick in anytime now...
Let's see if I can hear what she's mumbling...
Mmmmm... This is so good...
To think I had to travel to such a desolate place to start valuing the comfort of my life...
Well... That's what experiece is about, right?
Experience...
Yeah... I also had to deal with some new situations I never tought I... I...
... It's weird... I fell like I'm becoming so... close to him...
Of course... He helped me so much... I could be in serious trouble now if he didn't take such good care of me...
But also...
He seems...
I mean... Most men are assholes... They're just too afraid of me or falsely respectful... I don't know what is worse...
But He just treats me as an ordinary girl while taking care of me... It feels so...
But also... All those men... Trying to... take advantage of me...
All those men... Trying to... take advantage of me...
Yes, it was horrible in the beggining but... but...
To experiment so upclose how I'm desired by them... To know how the paths can be easily open by just letting them have a feel of my body...
It's weird, but... it's starting to feel... good...
If I could have... a little more...
Woah... Those were some very revealing thoughts, ...
I mean... She's more 'open' now... to some new level of interaction...
Nnhgnn... This steam is soaking up my skin... Feels so good...
Now this is starting to get really interesting...
He's really someone special...
He fixed this bath especially for me... I never felt closer to a man like this...
Oh, Lord... What's happening to me...
Mmm... Those men... I fell like should experience more... more...
Oh shit... It's really happening...
Yes... Touch me... Touch me...
Yes... Be gentle... Be gentle...
NNghh...
What are you doing to me... Not there... Not there...
Oh, Give it to me... Give it to me...
Holy shit... I should jump right there and make her fantasy real... But maybe I'd better no be revealed as a creepy peeping Tom....
Yes... I'll do anything to get out of the prison... Anything...
Take me, please... and bring your coleagues too...
Spoke like a natural born slut...
Oh... Larry... You bastard... What did you do to me?
I submit, Larry... Do me... Do me again... Your men can watch...
Spoke like a natural born slut...
Oh Lord... What am I saying...
We can't lie to ourselves in our fantasies
My work for the mistery man has being well done until now... And probably I can even get 'taste' of her as a bonus...
But I can't help it... My body feels so hot...
I never imagined one day I would touch myself like this...
But it feels so good...
So good...
Nnghh...
Whoah... Now that was good show...
But I'd better get out of here now before she leaves the shower...
This shower won't go much further than this... I feel like I failed on getting her in the right mood...
Okay... Soon she'll be looking for me at the computer terminal to look for the next clue of the artifact puzzle... I should go wait for her at the computer room when I'm ready...
